name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KJV Simple Search Parallel Bible App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search KJV Bible quickly, type [KJV] in omnibar, look up selected text, view popup verses, read plan alerts, and bookmark passages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your KJV Bible study experience! This powerful browser extension lets you:

Instantly find the verses you need: Search by chapter, verse, keyword, or topic directly from your browser.

Build your own Bible reference library: Save, bookmark, and organize important passages for deeper study.

Personalize your Bible study: Explore popular reading plans or create your own, get helpful reminders, and stay organized.

Discover deeper insights: Explore passages in context with convenient pop-up previews.

Install now and enhance your daily Bible time!
